alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; Sonoma Coastal Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 11 at 2:56PM PST until January 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northern California, including the following areas, Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore, Marin Coastal Range, North Bay Interior Mountains, North Bay Interior Valleys and Sonoma Coastal Range. * WHEN...Until Midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Excessive rainfall will bring a flood risk through late tonight - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; Sonoma Coastal Range
